metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, In My Hands has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: In My Hands has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Major,  and E Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
